meanings: cleaning, (쓸기) sweeping, (닦기) rubbing, clean (up), (쓸다) sweep, (닦다) rub, (진공청소기로) vacuum

vlive.korean: 난 청소 좋아하니깐 약간 뭐... - 청소 수업? I like to clean so... - Cleaning class? 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU’EST] 🍫🍫🍫🍫🍫
vlive.english: I like to clean so... - Cleaning class?

vlive.korean: 너 맨날 와서 이렇게 청소해 주면 안 되냐? Can you clean my house every day? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 요즘 너만 보면 자꾸 커진단 말이야 [리얼:타임:러브2] EP3
vlive.english: Can you clean my house every day?

vlive.korean: 그냥 집 청소하고 있어요 - 연습 말고 뭐... I've been cleaning home. - Except for practice... 듣기 View video GOT7 : 눈 덩어리💚
vlive.english: I've been cleaning home. - Except for practice...

vlive.korean: 요리하시는 분들 어떻게 청소하시면서 하는 거지? How do you all cook and clean up at the same time? 듣기 View video ASTRO : 따나의 얼렁뚱땅 떡국 만들기🐥🍲
vlive.english: How do you all cook and clean up at the same time?

vlive.korean: 청소 중인 거 아냐? Weren't you cleaning? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 학교에 우리에 대한 소문이 돈다 [연애미수] EP02 좋아하는 사람이 있으니까.

examples.korean: The rooms had all been cleaned and aired. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 방들을 모두 청소하고 환기를 해 두었었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: The showroom had been emptied and swept clean. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 상품 전시실은 텅 빈 채 깨끗이 청소되어 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The showroom had been emptied and swept clean. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She supplements her meagre income by cleaning at night. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 밤에 청소 일을 하여 변변찮은 수입을 보완한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She supplements her meagre income by cleaning at night. Add to Wordbook
